name: ASCENSION (chobochun, yungragu, hasnot)
description:
Our team wants to use our game to share a message of hope. This mountain that you are ascending is like the pandemic. In the middle of it, things may seem hopeless or unfair. Everyone is just doing their best to survive, going forwards hoping to see the light at the end of the tunnel. Sometimes you even need to take a leap of faith. But remember that you are not alone. Climb to the summit, with your perseverance and a little help along the way! Features: 

Platformer game with 3 different movement mechanics 

Traverse through 3 different territories 

Game playable with console and keyboard 

Keyboard Control: 

[A] & [D] to move 

Space bar to jump 

[S] + space bar jump down a platform 

Hold [R] to respawn 

F1: credit pops-up 

(Once unlocked) Hold [A] & [D] + space bar to wall jump

Theme: 

Ascension. Game was made for 10 Day Themed Game Jam. 

Credits: 

chobochun: programmer and story designer 

yungragu: platform designer and animator 

hasnot: artist and story designer 

This game uses additional assets from various sources (F1 in-game for detailed credits)
